title: Workshop/Conference: External Actors in Conflict Management in the Post-Soviet Space
abstractText:
This project consists of a workshop held at the University of Oxford engaging academics, analysts and policy-makers from the UK, US, EU and the Former Soviet Union. It will focus on the role of external actors in the unresolved ethnic and regional conflicts in the Former Soviet Union by exploring two questions:

  1. Does the engagement of external actors in the conflicts in the post-Soviet space explain the variation we observe in the eruption/mitigation of these conflicts?
  2. What are the actual linkages between external and domestic actors in the conflict zones, the linkages between different external actors, and how do these relationships affect conflict prevention, conflict resolution, or the outbreak of conflict in the region?
